SEARCH
Module help
Package help

Class ManagerPriceController

java.lang.Object
help.ManagerPriceController
public class ManagerPriceController extends Object
Controller class for managing the prices of products within the system. This class handles the functionality for updating and displaying the prices of various items.

  • Method Details

    • handleCloseButtonAction

      private void handleCloseButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action for the "Close" button. This will close the current stage.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the "Close" button click.

    • handleMinimizeButtonAction

      private void handleMinimizeButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action for the "Minimize" button. This will minimize the current stage to the taskbar.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the "Minimize" button click.

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes the controller and sets up the UI elements. This includes loading images for the UI and setting initial states for buttons. It also loads the current prices from the PriceDBO.

    • handleSignOutButtonAction

      private void handleSignOutButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action for the "Sign Out" button. This will load the login screen and sign the user out.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the "Sign Out" button click.

    • loadCurrentPrices

      private void loadCurrentPrices()
      Loads and displays the current prices and discount rate for the cinema halls from the PriceDBO. The prices are displayed in the respective UI elements.

    • handleClose

      private void handleClose()
      Handles the action for the "Close" button. This will close the current stage.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the "Close" button click.

    • handleMinimize

      private void handleMinimize()
      Handles the action for the "Minimize" button. This will minimize the current stage to the taskbar.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the "Minimize" button click.

    • handleProductManagement

      private void handleProductManagement()
      Handles the action for the "Product Management" button. This will load the product management page in the current window and update the stage to fullscreen.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the "Product Management" button click.

    • handlePersonnelManagement

      private void handlePersonnelManagement()
      Handles the action for the "Personnel Management" button. This will load the personnel management page in the current window and set the stage to fullscreen.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the "Personnel Management" button click.

    • handlePriceManagement

      private void handlePriceManagement()
      Handles the action for the "Price Management" button. This will load the price management page in the current window and set the stage to fullscreen.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the "Price Management" button click.

    • handleRevenueTax

      private void handleRevenueTax()
      Handles the action for the "Revenue and Tax" button. This will load the revenue and tax page in the current window and set the stage to fullscreen.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the "Revenue and Tax" button click.

    • handleUpdateHallA

      private void handleUpdateHallA()
      Handles the action for updating the price of Hall A. Validates the input price and updates the price in the database. Displays an alert with success or failure message.

    • handleUpdateHallB

      private void handleUpdateHallB()
      Handles the action for updating the price of Hall B. Validates the input price and updates the price in the database. Displays an alert with success or failure message.

    • handleUpdateDiscount

      private void handleUpdateDiscount()
      Handles the action for updating the discount rate. Validates the input discount and updates the discount in the database. Displays an alert with success or failure message.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType alertType, String title, String content)
      Displays an alert dialog with a specified type, title, and message content. The alert is modal to the primary application window and ensures it appears within the same window context. If the primary application window is in fullscreen, the alert retains this state.
      Parameters:
      alertType - The type of alert to display (e.g., INFORMATION, WARNING, ERROR).
      title - The title of the alert dialog, displayed in the dialog's title bar.
      content - The message content to be displayed in the alert dialog.
